sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"愉快的，高兴的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: happy, glad, cheerful, joyful, merry, delightful, gay, pleasant, nice, jolly, agreeable
means: happy ： 侧重感到满足、幸福或高兴。
glad ： 最普通用词，语气较弱，表示礼貌的惯用语。指乐于做某事或因某事而感到满足，常表愉快的心情。
cheerful ： 多指因内心的愉快而表现出兴高采烈，是强调而自然的感情流露。
joyful ： 语气较强，强调心情或感情上的欣喜。
merry ： 指精神情绪的暂时高涨，表示欢乐、愉快的心境或情景，侧重充满欢笑声和乐趣。
delightful ： 指能带来强烈的快乐，激起愉快的情感，用于非常愉快的场合。
gay ： 侧重无忧无虑、精神昂扬、充满生命的快乐。
pleasant ： 侧重给人以"赏心悦目"或"愉快的，宜人的"感受。
nice ： 语气较温和，泛指任何愉快或满意的感觉。
jolly ： 通俗用词，多指充满快乐与喜悦的神情。
agreeable ： 指与感受者的愿望、情趣或受好等和谐一致而带来的心情上的快意。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"令人愉快的，悦人的"之意。
means: pleasant ： 普通用词，指引起感官或精神愉快的人或事物。
agreeable ： 指与某人的情趣一致适合其爱好而令其愉快中意。
nice ： 口语用词，泛指一切令人愉快的人或事物。

sentence.Network_en: Lloyd George was most anxious to be agreeable and pleasant.
sentence.Network_cn: 劳埃德·乔治极力想表现得平易近人、和蔼亲切。

sentence.Network_en: "It's not an agreeable state of affairs," concurs Heitham.
sentence.Network_cn: “目前的事态并不令人满意。”海瑟姆赞同道。

sentence.Network_en: I'vegone out of my way to be agreeable to his friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已然特意地去讨好他的朋友们。

means.word_mean: 令人高兴的,舒心的,美丽迷人的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French agreable, from agreer 'make agreeable to' (see agree)

entry.def: If something is agreeable, it is pleasant and you enjoy it.

example.ex: ...workers in more agreeable and better paid occupations.
example.tran: 在条件更惬意、报酬更丰厚的行业工作的人

entry.tran: 亲切的;友善的;讨人喜欢的
entry.def: If someone is agreeable, they are pleasant and try to please people.

example.ex: ...sharing a bottle of wine with an agreeable companion...
example.tran: 与友善的同伴共饮一瓶酒

example.ex: I've gone out of my way to be agreeable to his friends.
example.tran: 我已然特意地去讨好他的朋友们。

entry.tran: 欣然同意的;令人赞同的
entry.def: If you are agreeable to something or if it is agreeable to you, you are willing to do it or to allow it to happen.

example.ex: She was agreeable to the project...
example.tran: 她对这个项目表示欣然同意。

example.ex: If you are agreeable, my husband's office will make all the necessary arrangements.
example.tran: 如果你同意，我丈夫的事务所将作出所有必要的安排。

means.word_mean: 1. suitable to your needs or similar to your nature;

sentences.sentence: "two congenial spirits united...by mutual confidence and reciprocal virtues"- T.L.Peacock

means.word_mean: 2. to your own liking or feelings or nature;

sentences.sentence: "My idea of an agreeable person...is a person who agrees with me"- Disraeli

auth_sentence.content: Manyenga's mood had changed from agreeable to anxious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Manyenga's mood had changed from agreeable to anxious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Manyenga's mood had changed from agreeable to anxious.

auth_sentence.res_content: No Art or Cost is omitted to make the Stay...agreeable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No Art or Cost is omitted to make the Stay...agreeable.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 符合的;一致的;欣然同意的;令人愉快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: a+gree感激,高兴+able可以……的→adj.符合的;一致的;欣然同意的;令人愉快的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 协定;协议;契约;达成协议;同意,一致
stems_affixes.word_buile: agree[v.同意, 赞成……的意见, 与……一致, 承认, 适合]+ment行为或结果→n.协定;协议;契约;达成协议;同意,一致

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同意, 赞成……的意见, 与……一致, 承认, 适合
stems_affixes.word_buile: a+gree感激,高兴→因为感激[或高兴],所以同意
dis分开,去掉,不+agree同意→v.有分歧;不一致

Sentence.sentence: The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.
The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.

sentences.en: He was quite agreeable to accepting the plan.

means.word_mean: 令人愉快的, 惬意的, 愉悦的,讨人喜欢的, 宜人的

sentences.en: It's very agreeable to have you here.
sentences.cn: 有你在这里很令人愉快。

jushi.english: I found him a very agreeable young person.
jushi.chinese: 我发现他是一个非常讨人喜欢的年轻人。

jushi.english: It is an agreeable weather.Let's go out for a walk.
jushi.chinese: 天气宜人,让我们出去散步吧。
